quotes.name: Drop description
quotes.quote: Renown-Class Battlecruiser - HMS Renown

quotes.name: Details
quotes.quote: I am the battlecruiser Renown, and I was training in Govan before coming here! Being able to weigh anchor ahead of schedule is a testament to my strength... Indeed! I will do my utmost to live up to everyone's expectations!

quotes.name: Receive
quotes.quote: The Renown-class battlecruiser Renown has come to join your ranks! My stature may be small, but my desire to succeed is great!

quotes.name: Log in
quotes.quote: Commander, Renown is awaiting your orders! Please issue today's commands!

quotes.name: View details
quotes.quote: There are many things that I do not understand in the Codex of the Royal Knights! Commander, can you offer me any guidance?

quotes.name: Main screen 1
quotes.quote: As long as Renown is here, no harm shall befall you, Commander!

quotes.name: Main screen 2
quotes.quote: The serious and dedicated Little Renown is cute? I see, I'll be sure to pass on the message to... wait, what?

quotes.name: Main screen 3
quotes.quote: It's not just you. Everyone here at port is truly amazing... I must redouble my efforts...!

quotes.name: Normal touch
quotes.quote: Candy? I'll have you know, Commander... Renown has no use for such things!

quotes.name: Special touch
quotes.quote: Commander! That's in violation of Royal etiquette!

quotes.name: Rub
quotes.quote: Myahh?! Wh-what are you doing?!

quotes.name: Mission reminder
quotes.quote: Commander, please allow Renown to handle the missions! H-huh? Commander, you're doing them all yourself?!

quotes.name: Mission complete
quotes.quote: Heave-ho... C-Commander, the m-mission rewards are... wooooahhhh!!

quotes.name: Mail reminder
quotes.quote: This one's for you, Commander. This one's also for you... and this one too...

quotes.name: Return to port
quotes.quote: You're not too bad, Commander... If Renown also works harder, will she be able to... be like you one day?

quotes.name: Commission complete
quotes.quote: Commander! The commission fleet will return to port in ten minutes! Please... Wait, did I get the time wrong...?

quotes.name: Enhancing complete
quotes.quote: For the Commander's sake, I'm ready... to become stronger!

quotes.name: Flagship fight
quotes.quote: Royal Navy, search and destroy!

quotes.name: Victory
quotes.quote: I've done it...! Wait, no! The books clearly teach that it is foolish to gloat over a single victory! Self control... self control...!

quotes.name: Defeat
quotes.quote: My apologies, Commander...

quotes.name: Skills
quotes.quote: The enemy shall never see my back turned!

quotes.name: Low HP
quotes.quote: Renown shall break your lines!

quotes.name: Upset
quotes.quote: Commander, please get your act together! Renown shall not abandon you!

quotes.name: Stranger
quotes.quote: I mustn't neglect my training or my studies... I'll do my utmost each day so that I may become a proper knight. Commander, do you want to follow this path as well?

quotes.name: Friendly
quotes.quote: Work is important, but taking breaks is also important! Coming from a Royal Knight, you're overworking yourself! After you finish this, please make sure to get some rest!

quotes.name: Crush
quotes.quote: Commander, why did the knights in that book betray their own king? Renown is nothing like those knights! I would never betray you even if it cost me my life!

quotes.name: Love
quotes.quote: So, Commander, is it fine for Renown to always stay here? Being close to you gives me strength, and above else, my love for you is absolute! ...Huh? Did I say something weird...?

quotes.name: Promise
quotes.quote: A promise ring? I know about this! Um, "I pledge to defend the weak and act with valor..." Oh, all I have to do is read this? Well then... "through thick and thin, we shall share our pain and willingly give love eternal." ...Commander, does that sound right?
